articles.title: Some Moderna COVID-19 vaccine recipients have experienced delayed skin reactions following jab, doctors say - Fox News
articles.description: Some receipts of Moderna’s COVID-19 vaccine have developed a delayed skin reaction to the jab days after receiving it, several doctors wrote in a letter published in the New England Journal of Medicine this week.

articles.title: Weekly jobless claims rise less than expected despite weather impact - CNBC
articles.description: First-time claims for unemployment benefits totaled 750,000 last week, up from 736,000 the week before but below the 750,000 estimate.
articles.content:
Weekly jobless claims edged higher last week but rose less than expected for an economy struggling to shake off impacts from a pandemic that has been around now for nearly a year.
